extendedInfo.description: Drop The Word is a fast pace addictive word game unlike any game before.  A blend of Tetris and Scrabble, players build columns of words using letter tiles descending from above. Words can be spelled going either up or down.  Unwanted columns can be destroyed using falling bombs.There's two ways to play:Quick Play gives players 3 minutes to use as many letters as possible to spell as many words as possible as fast as possible to become a Drop The Word Master. In Regular Play, players strive for the highest score by spelling as many words as possible before clearing the board.  Multiple words on the board lead to multiple points when the board is cleared.If any column reaches goes over six letters, game over!! Only three to six letter words can be spelledVisit www.guyinhisroomgames.com for complete directions and support

reviews.title: Fun word game to play
reviews.comment: Great game! Easy to play and hard to put down. Love the new look!
reviews.author: Shade O

reviews.title: Great game!!
reviews.comment: Great game if you like word games. Quick play can get kind of addictive when trying to go uo the belt levels. Didn\'t understand how that worked at first but figured it out after a few plays. You have to get three higher belts than the one you\'re at to go up to the next belt. The play can be sliw at first but picks up as you go up the levels. Different take on the average word game. Overall very fun game.
reviews.author: Rod Tuck

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Very good game well thought out
reviews.author: Kevin Ol
